interpretation:
The infinity symbol represents limitless potential and boundless energy. This card indicates that there are no limits to what you can achieve, and that you have the power to create your own destiny. The infinite nature of this symbol suggests that there is always more to be discovered, and that your journey is never truly complete.

This card encourages you to embrace the eternal nature of the universe and to trust in the unending cycle of life. It reminds you that everything is connected, and that you are an integral part of the infinite whole.

The infinity symbol can also suggest a need for balance and harmony in your life. Just as the symbol is a continuous loop, you must strive to find a sense of equilibrium between your physical, emotional, and spiritual selves.

Overall, the infinity card represents the infinite potential within each of us, and the limitless possibilities that exist in the world around us. Embrace the power of this symbol, and allow it to guide you towards your highest potential.
